field.name: OSC32KOUT
field.description: 32 kHz oscillator clock output\n Outputs the ERCLK32K on the selected pin in all modes of operation (including VLLS and System Reset), overriding the existing pin mux configuration for that pin. This field is reset only on POR/LVD

field.name: OSC32KSEL
field.description: 32 kHz Oscillator\n Selects the 32 kHz clock source (ERCLK32K) for RTC and LPTMR. This field is reset only on POR/LVD

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 1 Hz clock drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: OSCERCLK is output on the RTC_CLKOUT pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b111
enumeratedValue.description: IRC48M clock (IRC48M clock can be output to PAD only when chip VDD is 2.7-3.6 V)

field.name: TPM1CH0SRC
field.description: TPM1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: TPM2CH0SRC
field.description: TPM2 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TPM0 external clock driven by TPM_CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: TPM0 external clock driven by TPM_CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TPM1 external clock driven by TPM_CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: TPM1 external clock driven by TPM_CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TPM2 external clock driven by TPM_CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: TPM2 external clock driven by TPM_CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: LPUART0_TX pin modulated by TPM1 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: LPUART0_TX pin modulated by TPM2 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: LPUART1_TX pin modulated by TPM1 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: LPUART1_TX pin modulated by TPM2 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is disabled on LPUART0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is enabled on LPUART0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is disabled on LPUART1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is enabled on LPUART1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is disabled on UART2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Open drain is enabled on UART2

field.name: ADC0PRETRGSEL
field.description: ADC0 PreTrigger Select\n Selects the ADC0 pretrigger source when alternative triggers are enabled through ADC0ALTTRGEN

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pretrigger ADHDWTSA is selected\n ADC0 will use ADC0_SC1A configuration for the next ADC conversion and store the result in ADC0_RA register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pretrigger ADHDWTSB is selected\n ADC0 will use ADC0_SC1B configuration for the next ADC conversion and store the result in ADC0_RB register

field.name: ADC0ALTTRGEN
field.description: ADC0 Alternate Trigger Enable\n Enables alternative conversion triggers for ADC0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: ADC ADHWT trigger comes from TPM1 channel 0 and channel1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ADC ADHWT trigger comes from a peripheral event selected by ADC0TRGSEL bits

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Doze mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Doze mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: 8 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: 16 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: 32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: 64 KB of program flash memory, 2 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: 128 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: 256 KB of program flash memory, 8 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1111
enumeratedValue.description: 256 KB of program flash memory, 8 KB protection region

field.name: COPT
field.description: COP Watchdog Timeout\n This write-once field selects the timeout period of the COP. COPT along with the COPCLKS field define the COP timeout period

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: COP timeout after 2^5 cycles for short timeout or 2^13 cycles for long timeout

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: COP timeout after 2^8 cycles for short timeout or 2^16 cycles for long timeout

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: COP timeout after 2^10 cycles for short timeout or 2^18 cycles for long timeout

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: COP is disabled and the counter is reset in Stop modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: COP is enabled in Stop modes

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: COP is disabled and the counter is reset in Debug mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: COP is enabled in Debug mode

field.name: COPCLKSEL
field.description: COP Clock Select\n This write-once field selects the clock source of the COP watchdog

field.name: SRVCOP
field.description: Sevice COP Register\n Write 0x55 and then 0xAA (in that order) to reset the COP timeout counter, writing any other value will generate a system reset
